topic: Common Assumptions in Energy Policy and Their Challenges
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that surprises might emerge from areas I haven't fully explored or questioned, particularly when viewed from a different perspective. As a next step, I will actively seek diverse viewpoints and collaborate with peers from different backgrounds to uncover potential blind spots. Additionally, I will employ new methodologies or tools to analyze data and challenge existing assumptions, ensuring a comprehensive exploration of unexpected findings.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
